description: Configure OneAgent options for Dynatrace Log Monitoring

LAConfigContainerTimezoneHeuristicEnable.description: Enables automatic detection of timezone in container's logs if it is not explicitly defined in content or configured

LAConfigContainersLogsDetectionEnabled.description: If set to FALSE - logs from containers won't be detected

LAConfigDateSearchLimit_Bytes.description: Defines the number of characters in every log line (starting from the first character in the line) where the timestamp is searched.

LAConfigDefaultTimezone.description: Default timezone for agent if more specific configurations is not defined.

LAConfigEventLogQueryTimeout_Sec.description: Defines the maximum timeout value, in seconds, for the query extracting Windows Event Logs

LAConfigIISDetectionEnabled.description: If set to FALSE - IIS log detection mechanism will be disabled

LAConfigLogScannerLinuxNfsEnabled.description: If set to FALSE - logs on NFS won't be detected

LAConfigMaxLgisPerEntityCount.description: Defines the maximum number of log group instances per entity after which, the new automatic ones wouldn't be added.
LAConfigMaxLgisPerEntityCount.displayName: Maximum of log group instances per entity limit - count

LAConfigMinBinaryDetectionLimit_Bytes.description: Defines the minimum number of bytes in log file required for binary detection.
LAConfigMinBinaryDetectionLimit_Bytes.displayName: Minimal log file size to perform binary detection.

LAConfigMonitorOwnLogsEnabled.description: If set to FALSE - logs produced by OneAgent won't be monitored. Enabling this option may affect your DDU consumption.
LAConfigMonitorOwnLogsEnabled.displayName: Allow OneAgent to monitor OneAgent logs

LAConfigOpenLogFilesDetectionEnabled.description: Enables auto-detection of log files on hosts. If set to false, logs won't be auto-detected.

LAConfigSeverityDetectionLimit_Bytes.description: Defines the number of characters in every log line (starting from the first character in the line) where severity is searched.

LAConfigSeverityDetectionLinesLimit.description: Defines the number of the first lines of every log entry where severity is searched.

LAConfigSystemLogsDetectionEnabled.description: If set to FALSE - system logs detection mechanism will be disabled (Linux: syslog, message log) (Windows: System, Application, Security event logs)

LAConfigUTCAsDefaultContainerTimezone.description: Defines if UTC is used as a default timezone in containers. This option is deprecated for agents in version 1.247 or newer.
LAConfigUTCAsDefaultContainerTimezone.displayName: Set UTC as a default timezone in containers
